item.title: Apple Silicon M1 Power Consumption Deep Dive Part 2: Local Playback
item.description: Apple M1 is an amazingly efficient piece of silicon. How much power do you think it consumes while playing 4K and 1080p videos in VLC player? Read on to find out.

item.title: Apple Silicon M1 Power Consumption Deep Dive Part 1: Safari vs Chrome
item.description: Apple M1 is an amazingly efficient piece of silicon. How much power do you think it consumes while streaming from YouTube or Netflix? Read on to find out.

item.title: Philips Brilliance 4K UHD 27" Monitor Review
item.description: Hello internet friend! If you’ve landed here from an internet search hoping to find more info on this Philips monitor, then let me keep it short and save you some time.

item.title: Apple Silicon M1 supports "billion of colors" aka HDR 10-bit output
item.description: When most people hear Apple in a sentence, their next thought is likely the color. Does Apple Silicon M1 output “billion colors”?

item.title: Apple Silicon M1: Black. Magic. Fuckery.
item.description: These are the words used by the user holdagold on reddit to describe their experience with the new Apple Silicon M1 Macbook Air. Rarely does a product leave people effusing to the extent Apple Silicon M1 has done this week.
